categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic repulsorcraft

nodes.text: The Endor Forest Ranger was a type of armored repulsorcraft employed by the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. Endor Forest Rangers were notably used by the Alliance Army on the forest moon of Endor. Focused on terrain adaptability, Endor Forest Rangers were designed to deal with many different combat situations, and they were equipped with two laser cannons.
Endor Forest Rangers first appeared in the mobile game Star Wars: Galactic Defense, which was released in 2014 and shut down in 2016.
The vehicle was originally created for the Kenner Products Mini-Rig toy line in 1984.
